description.full: Get ready to turn your living room into an epic puzzle matching battle in Frozen Free Fall: Snowball Fight, featuring 195 FREE levels and an ALL-NEW local multiplayer mode!  Challenge your friends & family to a thrilling Snowball Fight where you dodge and throw snowballs by creating cascading combos.  Unleash spectacular power-ups and progress through challenging levels to unlock new characters and even more exciting puzzles!  Play now for FREE!  Before you download this experience, please consider that this game contains in-app purchases (IAPs) that cost real money.  We respect your wishes regarding your Privacy.  Please review our Privacy Policy at http://disneyprivacenter.com and our Terms of Use at http://disneytermsofuse.com.
description.short: Get ready to turn your living room into an epic puzzle matching battle in Frozen Free Fall: Snowball Fight, featuring 195 FREE levels and an ALL-NEW local multiplayer mode!
